item.description:
Sorry for the short notice on this one. I've been away and forgot how fast the monthly meeting was coming up...

Based on the poll results (http://www.meetup.com...) "The Atheism Tapes" won at 67%. The runner up was "The Invention of Lying", so we'll play that next month.

We'll be watching the first three interviews with philosophers Daniel Dennett and Colin McGinn and physicist Steven Weinberg. If there is time, I might try streaming one of the other choices... Hope you can make it!

The program is scheduled to start at 7 at the UU Church of Worcester, with doors opening at 6:30 for socializing and conversation. Please watch this page for changes.
item.name: Movie Night: The Atheism Tapes
